section.title: OFBiz: MFG: Manage Cost Component Calc Entries
section.para: In this screen you can create new cost calculations and modify existing calculations.

section.title: Modify cost calculation
section.para: The first part of the screen is to create a new cost calculation, or to modify an existing calculation. Click the 'Submit'-button to save the changes. Subsequently, the screen will be refreshed and the the modified details are shown in the lower part of the screen.

section.title: Cost calculations overview
section.para: This part of the screen shows the available cost calculations. Click the ID of cost calculation to modify it. Click the 'Delete'-button to remove a cost calculation.
